intro.text: Welcome to a short Gratitude Practice. This can help shift focus to the positive aspects of your day. Are you ready to begin? (yes/no)

practice_1.text: Great. Please take a moment to think of one specific thing that happened today, no matter how small, that you are grateful for. When you are ready, reply 'ok' or 'next'.

closing.text: Wonderful. Holding onto that feeling of gratitude, even for a moment, can make a real difference. Thank you for taking this time for yourself.

end_early.text: That's perfectly okay. Perhaps another time. You can choose another option from the menu when you're ready.
